text: Armory.inc| San Mateo, Ca (close to caltrain |Senior Software Engineers |Full-time ONSITE (no remote) | We are looking for passionate product focused Senior Engineers that are interested in cloud deployments. We are building a platform that helps software teams ship better software faster. Apply here then send an email to recruiting@Armory.io with "Applied from Hacker news" in the title so we can be sure to prioritize your application.
